description.original: This Plugin enables the use of Markdown Emoji Shortcodes :smile:
description.translation: This Plugin enables the use of Markdown Emoji Shortcodes :smile:

dict..setDesc('If this is turned on, Emoji sh: .setDesc('If this is turned on, Emoji shortcodes will be immediately replaced after typing. Otherwise they are still stored as a shortcode and you only see the Emoji in Preview Mode.')
dict..setDesc('If this is turned on, a Sugges: .setDesc('If this is turned on, a Suggester will appear everytime you type : followed by a letter. This will help you insert Emojis. (Doesn\'t work on mobile)')
dict..setDesc('Suggester gives priority to re: .setDesc('Suggester gives priority to recently used emoji.')
dict..setDesc('If you like this Plugin, consi: .setDesc('If you like this Plugin, consider donating to support continued development:')
